Text: I have a question. A lot of the time with the higher quality rips the audio cuts out in quiet parts of the movie. It abrutly comes back on when somone is talking or there is music. I use VLC player, but it does the same on WMP. I hook up my comp to my pc using a VGA cable and a 3.5 mini plug, I think(the headphone slot). It only messes up when hooked to the tv.
